short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: a simple configurable new tab extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: mtab is an extension that offers a modern new tab page, prioritizing customizability such as choosing wallpapers, bookmarks, and more. Additionally, it emphasizes a smooth user experience through its animations on the new page.
